channel.title: [Delta]DragonClaws (with code and error)
channel.description:
Theres one problem with my dclaws... [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,536154.msg3920233.html#msg3920233]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,536154.msg3920233.html#msg3920233[/url]
second is that when i spec on another player in a wildy or just in general in any player vs player combat the spec lags me out of the server then relogs me in here is the error in the server is this [code]error with player 2, Mrfun java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 at client.npcHit(client.java:416) at client.npcDamage(client.java:40) at client.Attack(client.java:5102) at client.process(client.java:15698) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:270) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unkown Source) Game saved for player Mrfun ClientHandler: client Mrfun disconnected[/code]
